Sniper

Sniper looks through his window, he sees Koga Shuko, He Aim his scope 
at Koga's chest. "Hmmm, He's straight ahead, A rocket could be 
helpful. Sniper turns his rifle around and hits all the glass out
with 
the butt of the Rifle. Sniper took off the Rifle's Scope.  He pulled 
out his Rocket Launcher. He put the scope on the rocket launcher. He 
aims the scope at Koga. "How many rockets I get in here, I got Umm 
ten. I'll use 3."

Sniper fires 3 rockets straight at Koga's chest. He then takes 8 
rockets out his storage bin. He loads them into his rocket launcher. 
Sniper looks up as he sees the explosion of his rockets.
